consequences_of_violation.body: Any violation of this EULA, including the prohibited content and conduct outlined above, may result in the termination of your access to our application.

We do not guarantee that our application will be uninterrupted or error-free. In no event shall Radroots Inc. be liable for any damages whatsoever, including but not limited to direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages, arising out of or in connection with the use or inability to use our application.
